meta.name: description
meta.content: Oeps! De pagina die je zoekt bestaat niet meer. Keer terug naar de homepagina of vraag een gratis website audit aan.
Oeps! De pagina die je zoekt bestaat niet meer. Keer terug naar de homepagina of vraag een gratis website audit aan.
Oeps! De pagina die je zoekt bestaat niet meer. Keer terug naar de homepagina of vraag een gratis website audit aan.

link.title: Pagina niet gevonden | Zee-Zicht

a.class: sr-only focus:not-sr-only focus:absolute focus:top-4 focus:left-4 focus:z-50 focus:px-4 focus:py-2 focus:bg-blue-600 focus:text-white focus:rounded-lg focus:shadow-lg

nav.class: fixed w-full z-50 top-0 start-0 transition-all duration-300 md:bg-white/90 md:backdrop-blur-xl md:border-b md:border-slate-100 md:shadow-sm

div.class: fixed inset-0 z-[100] hidden items-center justify-center p-4 sm:p-6 bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-sm transition-opacity duration-300
relative w-full max-w-2xl bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-2xl transform transition-all duration-300 scale-95 opacity-0 modal-content flex flex-col max-h-[90vh] sm:max-h-[85vh]

button.class: absolute top-4 right-4 z-10 p-2 text-white/80 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/10 rounded-lg transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-white/50

div.class: relative flex-shrink-0 bg-gradient-to-br from-cyan-600 to-blue-600 px-6 py-6 sm:px-8 sm:py-8 text-white overflow-hidden rounded-t-2xl

absolute inset-0 bg-[url('data:image/svg+xml;base64,')] opacity-20
relative flex items-center space-x-4 pr-8
p-2.5 sm:p-3 bg-white/20 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-xl

svg.class: lucide lucide-clipboard-check w-6 h-6 sm:w-8 sm:h-8

h2.class: text-xl sm:text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold mb-1 sm:mb-2 leading-tight

div.p: Ontdek het potentieel van je website

div.class: overflow-y-auto px-6 py-6 sm:px-8 sm:py-8
mb-6 sm:mb-8 grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-3 gap-4
flex items-start space-x-3 bg-slate-50 p-3 rounded-lg sm:bg-transparent sm:p-0
flex-shrink-0 w-6 h-6 rounded-full bg-cyan-100 flex items-center justify-center mt-0.5
flex items-start space-x-3 bg-slate-50 p-3 rounded-lg sm:bg-transparent sm:p-0
flex-shrink-0 w-6 h-6 rounded-full bg-cyan-100 flex items-center justify-center mt-0.5
flex items-start space-x-3 bg-slate-50 p-3 rounded-lg sm:bg-transparent sm:p-0
flex-shrink-0 w-6 h-6 rounded-full bg-cyan-100 flex items-center justify-center mt-0.5

label.class: block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1.5 sm:mb-2

input.name: website-url
input.class: w-full px-4 py-2.5 sm:py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-cyan-500 focus:border-transparent transition-shadow text-base

div.class: grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 gap-4

label.class: block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1.5 sm:mb-2

input.name: email
input.class: w-full px-4 py-2.5 sm:py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-cyan-500 focus:border-transparent transition-shadow text-base

label.class: block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1.5 sm:mb-2

input.name: company
input.class: w-full px-4 py-2.5 sm:py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-cyan-500 focus:border-transparent transition-shadow text-base

label.class: block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1.5 sm:mb-2

textarea.name: message
textarea.class: w-full px-4 py-2.5 sm:py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-cyan-500 focus:border-transparent transition-shadow resize-none text-base

div.class: flex items-start bg-slate-50 p-3 rounded-lg border border-slate-100

input.name: privacy
input.class: mt-1 h-4 w-4 text-cyan-600 focus:ring-cyan-500 border-gray-300 rounded shrink-0
input.label: Akkoord met privacyverklaring.

button.class: w-full bg-gradient-to-r from-cyan-600 to-blue-600 text-white font-semibold py-3.5 sm:py-4 px-6 rounded-lg hover:from-cyan-500 hover:to-blue-500 focus:outline-none focus:ring-4 focus:ring-cyan-300 transition-all duration-200 flex items-center justify-center space-x-2 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-0.5

div.class: md:hidden fixed inset-0 top-0 bg-black/20 backdrop-blur-sm -z-10 hidden

section.class: min-h-[70vh] flex items-center justify-center relative overflow-hidden bg-slate-50

div.class: absolute inset-0 z-0
absolute top-1/4 right-1/3 w-96 h-96 bg-cyan-300/10 rounded-full blur-3xl
absolute bottom-1/4 left-1/4 w-96 h-96 bg-blue-300/10 rounded-full blur-3xl
relative z-10 max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 text-center

span.class: text-9xl font-bold text-transparent bg-clip-text bg-gradient-to-r from-cyan-500 to-blue-600 opacity-20 select-none

div.p: Net als een toerist zonder kaart in de duinen... De pagina die je zoekt bestaat niet (meer) of is verplaatst.

div.class: flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4 justify-center items-center

a.class: px-8 py-3 bg-slate-800 text-white rounded-full font-medium hover:bg-slate-700 transition-all duration-300 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl

button.class: px-8 py-3 bg-white text-cyan-700 border-2 border-cyan-100 rounded-full font-medium hover:border-cyan-300 hover:bg-cyan-50 transition-all duration-300

div.class: mt-16 pt-8 border-t border-slate-200
flex flex-wrap justify-center gap-4 text-sm

bg-gradient-to-r from-slate-50 to-cyan-50 rounded-2xl p-8 lg:p-12 border border-slate-200 relative z-10
grid gap-8 lg:grid-cols-2 items-center
inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1 bg-cyan-100 text-cyan-800 rounded-full text-sm font-medium mb-4

div.p: Laten we samen kijken hoe we jouw digitale ambities kunnen waarmaken. Van strategie tot realisatie.

div.class: flex items-center text-sm text-slate-500
text-center lg:text-right relative
flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4 justify-center lg:justify-end w-full sm:w-auto

a.class: inline-flex items-center justify-center px-6 py-3 bg-cyan-600 text-white font-medium rounded-xl hover:bg-cyan-500 transition-all duration-300 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md w-full sm:w-auto

inline-flex items-center justify-center px-6 py-3 border-2 border-slate-200 text-slate-700 font-medium rounded-xl hover:bg-white hover:border-cyan-200 hover:text-cyan-600 transition-all duration-300 w-full sm:w-auto

div.class: relative bg-white
mx-auto w-full max-w-screen-xl p-4 py-6 lg:py-8
md:flex md:justify-between md:gap-12
mb-12 md:mb-0 max-w-md
div.p: Professionele websites en marketing die jouw bedrijf laten groeien. Van strategie en design tot techniek en automatisering.

div.class: space-y-2 text-slate-400
flex items-center
flex items-center
flex items-center
grid grid-cols-2 gap-8 sm:gap-6 sm:grid-cols-4

h2.class: mb-6 text-sm font-semibold text-white uppercase tracking-wider

a.class: text-slate-400 hover:text-cyan-400 transition-colors flex items-center group
text-green-400 font-bold hover:text-green-300 transition-colors duration-200 flex items-center

flex mt-6 sm:justify-center sm:mt-0 space-x-4
